name: Fighting Over It
description:
"Fighting Over It" is a multiplayer party game. It is currently only local couch multiplayer, it will require at least two players to play. It can be played with both keyboard and mouse as well as controller. You will need at least one controller to play.

     Fighting Over It is a party game inspired by the mechanics of games like (Rocket League, Getting Over It, and Sexy Hiking). In this current version we are showcasing the melonball gamemode. In this mode you play as two different teams and attempt to score as many goals as possible before the end of the match.

     The game has a WebGL build but it has not been tested very much. If you are having issues with this version try downloading the Windows build.

Controls
  •      Move hammer using mouse / joystick
  •      Press Y or Left Click in menu to change hat
